document_data.name: Salitre
document_data.mainbody: litre had short brown hair and pale skin. He wore a suit of [[leather armor]], and habitually used a [[crossbow]] and traps.
document_data.Description: Salitre had short brown hair and pale skin. He wore a suit of [[leather armor]], and habitually used a [[crossbow]] and traps.
document_data.Personality: He was rather paranoid and obsessed with his traps.
